Note: Similar to the Prayer at the Levacion and the other following Levacion in the Lay Folk’s Mass Book.
Subjects: prayers, for use in church; Eucharist
_description: John Audelay, ‘De Salutacione corporis Ihesu Christi’ — introductory 6-line rubric followed by seven 8-line stanzas (with ‘Hayle’ anaphora), a second 8-line rubric followed by three 6-line stanzas of prayer to Christ by the Wounds
